title: Looking for fonts that might be suitable to put on the side of a boat
content:
Hey  
I'm looking for these fonts or others like them that might be suitable to put on the side of a boat. Any suggestions are helpful.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [6a00e54f072fc3883400e553b9a92f8834-800wi.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150407205049/http:/typophile.com/files/6a00e54f072fc3883400e553b9a92f8834-800wi.jpg) | 99.67 KB |
| [boat name3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150407205049/http:/typophile.com/files/boat%20name3.jpg) | 211.41 KB |
| [boat name6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150407205049/http:/typophile.com/files/boat%20name6.jpg) | 167.78 KB |
| [WaveLaunch2.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150407205049/http:/typophile.com/files/WaveLaunch2.JPG) | 85.6 KB |
author: jennalawrence

comments.content: The typefaces you show in your sample are not particularly suitable to put on the side of a boat; they simply are very common fonts, many of them defaults on the computer, like Times, Helvetica, Helvetica Condensed etc.
